ORIGAM Documentation : Entity Rule

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified on Nov 05, 2015

An XPath based rule used for evaluating entity-level conditions. 

Input context: /row (e.g. /row/@EntityFieldName)

Used In

  • Entity Row Level Security rule
  • Conditional Formating Rule condition
  • Entity Field Dynamic Label condition
  • UI Action condition
  • Workflow UI Action Script Call condition
  • State machine transition condition
